about.me: I'm a full-stack PHP developer, developing reliable, scalable, and user-friendly web applications. I have experience working with both the client-side and server-side, from responsive layouts to creating interfaces for implementing business logic and interacting with databases.
about.me2: I use PHP, Laravel, and SQL for server-side development and modern technologies to create user-friendly interfaces. I work with Git, adhere to MVC and REST principles, and focus on application security.
